title: Add Instagram and email contact links to Harmony Incense site footer

requirements.text: Add public contact links to the site footer, including (1) an email link for viraajdudeja12@gmail.com and (2) an Instagram link to https://www.instagram.com/harmonyincense.in?igsh=bnR4a3FhYzFidXJy&utm_source=qr, using clear English labels.
acceptanceCriteria: The footer displays a clearly labeled email contact link that uses a mailto: URL for viraajdudeja12@gmail.com.
The footer displays a clearly labeled Instagram link that uses exactly: https://www.instagram.com/harmonyincense.in?igsh=bnR4a3FhYzFidXJy&utm_source=qr
The Instagram link opens in a new tab/window and uses rel="noopener noreferrer".
All user-facing labels for these links are in English.
Existing footer content (copyright, caffeine.ai attribution) remains present and functional.

constraints: Do not modify any files under frontend/src/components/ui (read-only).
Do not modify files listed as immutable in SYSTEM_CONTEXT (e.g., frontend/src/main.tsx, frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts, frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts).
Do not route or serve contact link data through the backend; implement as static frontend content.
nonGoals: Adding social embeds, Instagram feed, or API integrations.
Adding new backend fields or storing contact info in canister state.
Changing the overall site theme or layout beyond placing the contact links appropriately in the footer.
